* true: send the long value after the mouse button is released
* false: send the long value when the time since the button is pressed is greater than shortThreshold before the button is released

@description.name: @description
@description.body: true: send the long value after the mouse button is released false: send the long value when the time since the button is pressed is greater than shortThreshold before the button is released
